item.title: Say hello to Intel's latest and greatest chips for business - Windows Central
item.description:
1. Say hello to Intel's latest and greatest chips for business  Windows Central
  2. Intel unveils its most powerful AI PCs yet - new Intel Core Ultra Series 2 processors pack in vPro for lightweight laptops and high-performance workstations alike  Yahoo
  3. More efficient mobile workstation laptops on the horizon: Intel releases Arrow Lake CPUs for business laptops  Notebookcheck.net
  4. Intel Maps New vPro Chips to MITRE's ATT&CK Framework  Dark Reading

item.title: Microsoft goes native with Copilot. Again - The Register
item.description:
1. Microsoft goes native with Copilot. Again  The Register
  2. Update for Copilot on Windows begins rolling out to Windows Insiders with new features and improvements  Windows Blog
  3. Microsoft just rebuilt Copilot for Windows with a fancy native UI, and it looks GOOD  Windows Central
  4. I Tried Microsoft Copilot’s Mac App, and You Probably Shouldn't  Lifehacker
  5. Release Notes: March 5th, 2025  Microsoft
